data.title: Bachelor's Degree Completion Online Rockford IL
data.meta_description: The Business Management bachelor's degree completion program for working adults with some college. Take classes online or in the evening. Apply now!
data.text:
RU Online

The RU Online program at Rockford University offers three major options: business management, accounting, or human services. The flexible online format enables working professionals, parents, military service members, frequent travelers and many more to earn a Rockford University degree.

We value your experience. Students can now earn university credit for documented work training (Six Sigma, SHRM, company-sponsored leadership training, continuing education, etc.).

Bachelor of Science in Management Studies

Harness leadership abilities, cultivate interpersonal skills, and promote decision-making based on critical thinking all within the context of a liberal arts education. Build on your previously completed coursework to embrace a changing workplace, success in business management, and aspire to leadership.

Bachelor of Science in Accounting Studies

Gain a solid foundation in the field of accounting and familiarity with various accounting procedures. Learn how to record financial transactions and make managerial decisions using accounting data. Analyze and develop financial statements.

Bachelor of Science in Human Services

Understand the human services system and how non-profit systems are funded. Learn strategies for interventions with various populations and implement trauma-informed approaches to serving clients. Gain skills for collaborating and working in teams.

It’s Flexible.

Enjoy online 8-week classes.

100 percent online classes allow you to earn your degree from anywhere.

Complete in as few as 18 -24 months (depending upon transferable credits).

It’s Collaborative.

Virtually interact with your peers in small classes of 18 students.

Learn from faculty members with corporate, real-world experience.

It’s Affordable.

$485 per credit hour.

Financial Aid is available to those who apply and qualify.

Utilize your employee or military tuition benefits.

It’s Convenient.
